sys_script_include.name: SendOpportunityDetails

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_f4ffece8472902104e3dfe02d16d4334
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1331380_pro_bono.SendOpportunityDetails</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>SendOpportunityDetails</name><script><![CDATA[var SendOpportunityDetails = Class.create();
SendOpportunityDetails.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    auto_fill_client_details: function() {
        var id = this.getParameter("unique_id");
        var client_record = new GlideRecord("x_1331380_pro_bono_opportunity");
        client_record.addQuery("sys_id", id);
        client_record.query();
        if (client_record.next()) {
            var obj = {};
            var client_array = ["client_name", "matter_name", "matter_type", "client_type", "language_requirement", "representation_type", "referral_source", "matter_office", "deadline", "keni_request_number", "matter_desciption"];

            for (var i = 0; i < client_array.length; i++) {
                obj[client_array[i]] = client_record.getValue(client_array[i]);
            }

            return JSON.stringify(obj);


        }

    },

    type: 'SendOpportunityDetails'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-10 10:49:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>f4ffece8472902104e3dfe02d16d4334</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SendOpportunityDetails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Pro Bono ServiceNow" source="x_1331380_pro_bono">8b514b8647c502104e3dfe02d16d4300</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Pro Bono ServiceNow">8b514b8647c502104e3dfe02d16d4300</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f4ffece8472902104e3dfe02d16d4334</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-10 10:53:43</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
